noun.definition: A feeling of surprise and admiration caused by something beautiful, unexpected, or unfamiliar.
noun.example: He observed the intricacy of the ironwork with the wonder of a child.

noun.definition: A person or thing regarded as very good, remarkable, or effective.

verb.definition: Desire or be curious to know something.
verb.example: I wonder what she is doing now.
People wondered at the change in him.

usage_examples: I wonder if it will rain today.
The Seven Wonders of the World.
